faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about IvyEvents

q1.question: How do I create an invitation?
q1.answer: Creating an invitation is simple! Just sign up for free, choose a template from our gallery, customize it with your event details and photos, then share it via email, text, or social media. The entire process takes less than 10 minutes.

q2.question: Can I customize the invitation templates?
q2.answer: Absolutely! All templates are fully customizable. You can change colors, fonts, images, text, and layout.

q3.question: How does RSVP tracking work?
q3.answer: Guests RSVP with one click. You'll see responses in real-time and can send reminders to guests who haven't replied.

q4.question: Is IvyEvents free to use?
q4.answer: Yes! We offer a free plan for small events. Pro and Premium plans unlock advanced features for larger events.

q5.question: Can I use IvyEvents for professional event planning?
q5.answer: Definitely. You can manage multiple events, use premium templates, and keep everything organized for clients.

q6.question: Are the invitations mobile-friendly?
q6.answer: Yes! All invitations are responsive and work beautifully on desktop, tablet, and mobile.

q7.question: What if I need help or have questions?
q7.answer: We offer a help center and email support. Pro and Premium users get priority support with faster response times.

about.title: About Us
about.heroSubtitle: We're building the future of event planning beautiful, simple, and accessible to everyone.
about.missionText: To empower individuals and professionals to create unforgettable events with elegant digital tools that save time and delight guests.
about.visionText: A world where every celebration is effortlessly planned, beautifully presented, and deeply personal.
about.valueSimplicityDesc: We believe great tools should be intuitive and joyful to use.
about.valueEleganceDesc: Every detail matters from invitations to the last dance.
about.valueInclusionDesc: Beautiful events for every culture, budget, and celebration.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the IvyEvents platform.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing or using IvyEvents, you agree to be bound by these Terms & Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

services.title: 2. Description of Services
services.text: IvyEvents provides a digital platform for creating event invitations, managing guest lists, tracking RSVPs, and organizing event details. Services are available through web browsers and mobile devices.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You must provide accurate information during registration and keep it up to date.

payment.title: 4. Payment & Subscriptions
payment.text: Paid plans are billed according to the pricing displayed at the time of purchase. All payments are processed securely through our payment partners. Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis.

content.title: 5. User Content
content.text: You retain ownership of content you upload. By uploading content, you grant IvyEvents a license to display and process it within the platform. You must not upload illegal or harmful content.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.text: IvyEvents is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from use of the platform.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.text: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of IvyEvents after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.text: For questions about these terms, please contact us at support{'@'}ivyevents.com.
